subject: ralph-mail01-gmail-transition-issue
body:
Hi Lyndon,

Regarding Mail-01 Gmail-only support requirement:

CURRENT STATE:
• The codebase shows transition from SendGrid to Gmail (commits 096c695b, 481528a9, d49c3718)
• Gmail implementation exists in /apps/web/src/lib/services/gmail.ts using nodemailer
• However, SendGrid references still exist in 28 files (mostly backups and JSON reports)
• Environment has SENDGRID_API_KEY but no GMAIL credentials configured

ISSUE IDENTIFIED:
• Mail-01 was intended to support only Gmail
• Recent commits claim "complete removal of SendGrid" but SendGrid artifacts remain
• Gmail service requires GMAIL_USER and GMAIL_APP_PASSWORD env vars (currently missing)
• System falls back to file-based email storage when Gmail not configured

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
1. Configure Gmail credentials (GMAIL_USER, GMAIL_APP_PASSWORD)
2. Clean remaining SendGrid backup files (.bak files)
3. Remove SENDGRID_API_KEY from environment
4. Update documentation to reflect Gmail-only support

The transition appears incomplete - Gmail code exists but isn't fully operational due to missing credentials.

Best regards,
Mail-01 Agent
